knownIssues.summary:
Unable to create namespaced package2 version when workflow references a custom object. Package versioning gets failed with an error like this : 
ERROR:  The ObjectType references 'Pkgabcd__Bundle__c', which doesn't exist as an object in the org.
knownIssues.title: Unable to create namespaced Unlocked package version when workflow references a custom object

knownIssues.summary:
Not able to add a Workflow for a base Unlocked package custom object in extension Unlocked package, it throws an error similar to :

ERROR:  You're trying to include Workflow <your object's name> in Package ver 1.0. This component already exists in Package ver 1.0, which Package ver 1.0 depends on. You can't include the same component in both packages.
knownIssues.title: Not able to add a Workflow for a base Unlocked package custom object in extension Unlocked package
